full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME BTZA'I GDAMS PA RGYAS SPROS GSAL STON SHEL DKAR ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES ME BTZA'I GDAMS PA RGYAS PAR SPROS NAS GSAL BAR STON PA'I ZIN BRIS RAB DRANGS SHEL DKAR ME LONG GSAR BA 'DI NI SNGAGS SMAN BRGYUD PA'I SROG SHING DAM PA PI JI'I RIGS 'BANGS THA SHAL PA, DGE BSHES BSTAN 'DZIN PHUN TSOGS KYIS RANG SLOB GSAR BU PA 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN GDAGS PAR BYA SNYAM NAS 'DUN PA DKAR POS SBYAR BA'I DGE BAS LUS CAN KUN KYANG DUG GSUM NYES 'KHRUGS NOD PA'I GCONG NAD LAS THAR SDE BDE CHEN THAR PA MCHOG GI SA LAM YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ` LCAGS PO RI'I GRA RIGS DHO PA SMAN RAMS PA PHUN TSOGS DAR RGYAS KYIS GNANG BA'I DPE CHA YIN LAGS, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
